title: Savory Spinach, Parmesan & Feta Muffins
directions: Liberally grease muffin pan with oil or butter
In a large bowl, add and mix together the dry ingredients - flour, salt, baking powder, Parmesan, and Italian seasoning.
In a medium bowl, beaten eggs, milk and olive oil and then whisk until thoroughly combined
Add the spinach, tomatoes, olives, hot pepper sauce and pepper, then mix well
Mix the dry ingredients (flour mixture) in with the wet (egg mixture), to form a batter
Spoon the batter evenly into the greased muffin pan compartments
Sprinkle some pepper and the extra Parmesan on top of each portion of batter
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, until the muffins have slightly risen and are lightly browned
Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before removing them from the muffin pan onto a wire rack
ingredients: ½ cup vegetarian Parmesan, shredded or grated (plus extra for sprinkling on top)
½ tablespoon Italian seasoning (or your favorite herb blend)
1 cup grape or cherry tomatoes, slices in half
